page.title: 06WINGRAVE'S POPULATION
page.content: The population of the village has grown a lot in the past 10 years. The main reason for increase has been the building of a housing estate. This has increased the population by around 220 people. Many houses have been built around the village including a small estate by the church. The population now stands at about 1000 people. Most people are adults but there about 350 children under 16. Most people work outside the village but about 20% work in Wingrave. Not many people have moved out of the village over the years. Quite a lot of people have relatves in the village and donÂ£t want to move.
